metadata.name: Strangers in Paradise, Vol. 2
metadata.description:
Volume Two of SiP is merely 14 issues, but the story was nominated for multiple Eisner and Harvey awards, winning the Eisner Award for Best Continuing Series. 

When Katchoo returns from visiting a sick friend, she brings something terrible back with her-her own past. Soon, the lives of Francine and Katchoo are turned upside down as Katchoo's former employer/lover Darcy Parker arrives to accuse her of stealing $850,000. When Francine's loyalty to her friend becomes life-threatening, Katchoo makes the ultimate sacrifice to save her friend.
